name: ORBRIUM 10X 8 inch Wooden Train Tracks Accessories Set | 10" Extra Long Wooden Straight Track Expansion Compatible with Thomas, Brio, IKEA, Melissa & Doug Railways
short_description: 10X 8" long straight tracks, perfect for extended runs, long bridges, and fewer joints in your wooden railway layouts.
Our wooden train tracks are made with premium Beech Wood – same species of hardwood used by Thomas & BRIO.
Beech wood has a fine, tight grain and rich natural color. Our tracks are smooth, and far more solid than the pale, softer woods used by competitors.

Tracks made with beech are dense and heavier, giving a substantial feel in kids’ hands, and they are tougher and resist fingernail marks far better than the softwood alternatives used by competitors. Our straight tracks feature durable one piece construction with no plastic ball insert at the male end.
Compatible with Thomas, BRIO, Melissa & Doug, Ikea, Imaginarium, and all major wooden railway brands.
STEM inspired and Montessori friendly track pieces that encourage hands-on building, problem solving, and creative layout design.
A practical and thoughtful gift that expands any wooden railway and encourages creative building.
Comforms to U.S. and Canadian Toys Safety Standards.

Whether it's for Christmas, birthdays, or any special occasion, this kids' train set is sure to delight. It's compatible with popular brands like Thomas the Train toys, making it a great addition to any collection.

Trusted Quality & Safety: Our wooden train set is crafted with high-quality materials, free from moldy wood and toxic paints. It has been rigorously tested in TUV labs and exceeds ASTM F963 and CPSIA safety standards in the USA, ensuring a safe and enjoyable play experience. Perfect for those seeking safe and durable toy train tracks and train toys for toddlers aged 1-3.
